last_episode_to_air.name: The Final Revenge
last_episode_to_air.overview: Tae On catches Hera, thinking that she's winning the game, but Hera is already prepared. Tae On's plan is still ongoing, Hera and her crew are committed to ruining Tae On.

name: The Goddess of Revenge
overview: A 'wife of a famous broadcaster and freelance entertainer' has been doing well for 12 years. Due to a mistake, her life falls apart overnight However, she learns that there was another reason for her downfall, and so begins her revenge.

episodes.name: How Can I Become Like You?
episodes.overview: Hera is the wife of a famous MC, and a soon-to-be owner of her own program. One day, she meets a fan on her autograph event, and has a drink with him later on. The next day, she is surrounded by reporters, questioning her about her affair with a young man. Hera visits the detective agency to investigate, and soon finds out that this "affair" was arranged by her own husband.

episodes.name: Please Continue
episodes.overview: Hun Seok's affair is revealed to public on Hera's channel. Hun Seok doesn't back down and decides to sues her. The lawyer Min Joon comes to rescue. Min Joon suggests Hera to continue her revenge channel. As Hera can no longer be on television, and she still has to support her son's study, she decides to take Min Joon's offer.

episodes.name: Ga On Is Not My Son
episodes.overview: Min Joon is assigned to handle the sexual assault case of CEO Song and his secretary, Seung Joo. Hera is hit by a car. At the hospital, she meets Seung Joo who has just attempted suicide. In order to successfully take the place of the head of FBC, Hoon Seok holds a press conference, revealing to public that Ga On is not his son, and how he was deceived by Hera all these years. Meanwhile, Hera realizes Seung Joo was introduced to the CEO by Hoon Seok. Now Seung Joo is crying for help in front of Hera, requesting for revenge.

episodes.name: The Secret Room
episodes.overview: Hera becomes CEO Song's secretary in order to find evidence of the sexual assault. She finds a secret room in his office. Hera discovers some footage of the sexual assault but is found out by CEO Song.

episodes.name: Pay For The Debts
episodes.overview: Hera successfully reveals CEO Song on her channel, but at the end, Tae On and CEO Song are not punished as she wishes. Min Joon and Hera meet the highschooler Jeong Woo, who's been working all the time. Eun Hye offers her support to Jeong Woo. But due to some misunderstanding, Hera decides not help Jeong Woo. This causes a misunderstanding between her and Eun Hye.

episodes.name: Hera's Revenge Team
episodes.overview: Hera finds out that her debt is now being handled by Happy Credit. She decides to help Jeong Woo. Eun Hye and Hyeon Seong both join hands and become part of Hera's live streaming revenge team.

episodes.name: The Trauma
episodes.overview: After the organ auction case was settled, Min Joon pretends to be fine, but worries about Hera, who is suffering from the psychological trauma of being kidnapped.

episodes.name: Eliminate The Obstacles
episodes.overview: As President Kim does not step down from his post and Hera always obstructs Tae On's plans, Tae On instructs Mr. Kang to eliminate her obstacles, President Kim and Hera.

episodes.name: The Truck Driver
episodes.overview: After hearing the news of the accident, Min Joon immediately wonders if this is related to FB Group. Eun Hye and Hyeon Seong find out that the driver of the truck belongs to Happy Credit, so they begin their investigation...

episodes.name: Biological Mother
episodes.overview: Min Joon told Hara that since he is the biological son of the President , all future parental rights and custody rights will be transferred to the name of the President. Hara cannot accept...

episodes.name: The Child
episodes.overview: Tae On finally gets to know that Ga On is her father's child. Tae On is furious that Kang did not handle Cha Ee Hyeon and the child well.

episodes.name: He's Back
episodes.overview: Mr. Kim is back with his plan to find Ga On. Hera mentions the fire at the warehouse that happened 11 years ago. Mr. Kim is suspicious of that past accident...

episodes.name: Misunderstanding
episodes.overview: Min Joon realizes what happened between Hera and his sister through Mr. Gu and starts to get confused.

episodes.name: Car Accident
episodes.overview: President Kim takes Ga On to attend the grandmother's memorial service. The handwheel suddenly gets out of control and they are in danger...

episodes.name: Reveal the Truth
episodes.overview: People plan to reveal what Tae On's crime on broadcast and on live-stream, and take Tae On away from the nursing hospital at the same time...

episodes.name: The Final Revenge
episodes.overview: Tae On catches Hera, thinking that she's winning the game, but Hera is already prepared. Tae On's plan is still ongoing, Hera and her crew are committed to ruining Tae On.
